text.section: An appeal from an order appointing a curator to collect and preserve the estate of an absent person may be taken as in the case of an administrator.
An appeal from any order appointing a curator under KRS 395.410 shall not suspend the powers of the curator.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3901, 3902a-1.
